column3: “First time trying this strain. So since I saw it had properties to combat nausea I just couldn't resist. Got it in a sugar wax form. I was on the verge of dry heaving before I heated up that nail and within seconds of inhaling a fat rip the nausea vanished! A gentle cerebral tingling, a blanket feeling of relaxation and calm. Love it. Not too couch lock feel. But I know I'd have no difficulty falling asleep. I recomm...”

“The buzz is quite good, chill, very kush-like. Good for my back.
Now on the taste and smell: it's amazing. 
One of my all time favorite strains smell and taste-wise. If you, like me, enjoy citrusy, fruity smells and tastes in your bowl, i highly recommend getting it if it crosses your way.”
“I absolutely love this strain!! I have multiple sclerosis and it really really helps with my symptoms! it gives you a nice body high of relaxation and it does what it says it's supposed to!!”
“This strain is so relaxing!full body relaxation.”

“Big Kush is 50/50 Hybrid that leaves you feeling uplifted and happy. Its a great strain if you suffer from PTSD, Depression, and stress. I can see pixles in the air. Its visually alteering more then a lot of other strains. I know everyone is different but I felt very relaxed and slightly couch locked. An awesome day or night strain.”
“I have multiple sclerosis in this flower is absolutely awesome.”
“Don't try it, I spin kicked my nana when I had a bong of this”

“I have had big Kush  in a younger fresher specimens and a month later I purchased a batch that had more chance to grow more Cbd and was more mature and dense. The more Immature example had more of an antidepressant effect and more lemon flavor, it was really a happy high, more happy than most strains (this effect really stands out) with resolution and lasting relief from migraine ,nausea, nerve pain. There may be bet...”

“Excellent lift, no couch effect here! First time trying the hybrid and is a new fave. Has a slight cerebral effect but definitely a body high, nice and relaxing. I had nausea pretty bad all day. After a couple hits it was gone. It has been feeling like I can get shit done.”
“Taste is great. Gets body and head simultaneously in the right place!”
“Well I bought this STUFF today... tobe honest it giving me a headache, not my fav”
